Uses of Package
org.jgrapes.core

  • Packages that use org.jgrapes.core 
    Package Description
    org.jgrapes.core
    This package defines the interfaces and classes that provide the core functionality of JGrapes.
    org.jgrapes.core.annotation  
    org.jgrapes.core.events  
    org.jgrapes.core.internal  
    org.jgrapes.io  
    org.jgrapes.io.events  
    org.jgrapes.io.util  
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.core used by org.jgrapes.core 
    Class and Description
    AbstractComponent
    A convenience base class for new components.
    Channel
    Represents a communication bus for sending events between components.
    Component
    Marks a class as a component.
    Event
    The base class for all events.
    EventPipeline
    An event pipeline is a queue of events that are sent to the components of the associated tree.
    Manager
    Provides methods for manipulating the component hierarchy and for firing events.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.core used by org.jgrapes.core.annotation 
    Class and Description
    Channel
    Represents a communication bus for sending events between components.
    ClassChannel
    The root base class for channels that use their class (type) as key for matching channels with handlers.
    Event
    The base class for all events.
  • Classes in org.jgrapes.core used by org.jgrapes.core.events 
    Class and Description
    Component
    Marks a class as a component.
    Event
    The base class for all events.

  • Classes in org.jgrapes.core used by org.jgrapes.io 
    Class and Description
    AbstractComponent
    A convenience base class for new components.
    Channel
    Represents a communication bus for sending events between components.
    Component
    Marks a class as a component.
    Manager
    Provides methods for manipulating the component hierarchy and for firing events.
    NamedChannel
    A class for channels identified by a name (string).
